Video contains my footage from my work experience on a fishing boat in the Bering Sea. I've edited this video and composed music for it.

Ableton Live 9 Suite Miroslav Philharmonik Kontakt 5 Sony Vegas Pro 11.0

Video remake of I'M ON A BOAT by THE LONELY ISLAND. It contains footage from a fishing boat in the Bering Sea taken by my head camera. I have learned to edit videos in Sony Vegas Pro by making this clip.

Sony Vegas Pro 11.0
